mapper.insert: insert into mileage ( mileage_no, mileage_use, mileage_saving, mileage_total, mileage_member_id, mileage_date, orderfinish_no, mileage_current ) values ( #{mileage_no}, #{mileage_use}, #{mileage_saving}, #{mileage_total}, #{member_id}, sysdate, #{orderfinish_no}, (select member_point from member where member_id = #{member_id}) )
mapper.select: select member_point from member where member_id = #{member_id}
mapper.update: update member set member_point = #{member_point} where member_id = #{member_id}
update mileage set mileage_current = #{mileage_current} where mileage_member_id = #{mileage_member_id}
mapper.select: select count(*) from mileage where mileage_member_id = #{mileage_member_id}
select count(*) from mileage where mileage_member_id = #{member_id} and mileage_date between to_date(#{start_time}) and to_date(#{end_time})
select mileage_date from mileage where mileage_member_id = #{mileage_member_id} order by mileage_date asc

select o.orderfinish_no, o.orderfinish_product_name, o.orderfinish_product_amount, o.orderfinish_delivery_price, o.orderfinish_total_price, o.orderfinish_final_price, o.orderfinish_member_name, o.orderfinish_member_phonenum, o.orderfinish_member_address, o.orderfinish_date, p.product_mainimage, p.product_no from order_finish o, product p where o.orderfinish_product_no = p.product_no and o.orderfinish_no = #{orderfinish_no}
select DISTINCT pay from payment where orderfinish_no = #{orderfinish_no}
select mileage_use from mileage where orderfinish_no = #{orderfinish_no}
